item.title: Sorry, people, cycling is not a sport
item.description: as per usual.. a bunch of stuff is happening…North Korea has given a date to the U.S. to resolve its problems with N. Koreas nuclear arms.. woah.. I guess we should really learn about earth before the N. koreans and the U.S. blow it up.. the weapons inspector from the U.K. that killed himself.. is shown in a tape criticising blair’s need for evidence to support his false claim of WMD in Iraq.
